statements: UPDATE kitchen_inventory SET quantity = 10, location = 'Shelf A' WHERE tool_id = 1;

UPDATE kitchen_inventory SET quantity = 10, location = 'Shelf A' WHERE tool_id = 1;
UPDATE kitchen_inventory SET location = 'Cabinet B', quantity = 15 WHERE tool_name = 'Knife';
UPDATE kitchen_tools SET quantity = quantity + 5 WHERE tool_category = 'Cookware';
UPDATE equipment SET quantity = 20, equipment_type = 'Utensils' WHERE equipment_id = 3;
UPDATE kitchen_tools SET quantity = 10 WHERE tool_category = 'Cooking Utensils' AND tool_name = 'Spatula';
UPDATE equipment SET quantity = 50, equipment_type = 'Electrical' WHERE equipment_name = 'Blender';
UPDATE KitchenTools SET quantity = 15 WHERE tool_name = 'Knife';
UPDATE KitchenEquipment SET depreciation_status = true WHERE equipment_id = '1f96d518-568a-4c22-b569-570865558837';
UPDATE KitchenTools SET quantity = quantity + 5, stored_location = 'Pantry' WHERE tool_id = 'a07de58e-12f3-4b64-9bcf-d5d1e10f6071';
UPDATE KitchenEquipment SET quantity = 10, depreciation_status = TRUE WHERE equipment_id = '3f5f1de9-ca6d-41b1-91ce-46b4055f7c35';
UPDATE KitchenTools SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE tool_id = 1;
UPDATE EquipmentInventory SET quantity = quantity - 5 WHERE equipment_id = 2;
UPDATE KitchenTools SET quantity = 10, price = 25.50 WHERE tool_id = 1;
UPDATE KitchenEquipment SET price = 100.00, quantity = 5 WHERE equipment_id = 2;

UPDATE kitchen_equipments SET quantity = 20, price = 99.99 WHERE equipment_name = 'Blender';
UPDATE kitchen_tools SET quantity = quantity + 5, price = 15.99 WHERE tool_name = 'Knife';
UPDATE equipment_transactions SET quantity_change = quantity_change - 2, transaction_date = '2022-04-20 10:30:00' WHERE equipment_id = '749b2c16-16ef-4e54-a175-a5e391d1f44a';
